text.div:
Generated Narrative: CodeSystem dosage-condition-code

Properties

This code system defines the following properties for its concepts

NameCodeTypeDescription
typetypecodeThe type that goes in ConditionDetails.value for this code
detailsdetailsstringDocumentation about what might go in the details for this code

Concepts

This case-sensitive code system http://hl7.org/fhir/CodeSystem/dosage-condition-code defines the following codes in a Is-A hierarchy:

CodeDisplayDefinitiontypedetails
if-needed If NeededWhether this is needed. Note that this is different to PRN, because the entire course is if required, not on a per dose basisbooleanN/A
tolerates Patient tolerates MedicationWhether the patient tolerates a medication (e.g. SCT 1303423003)booleanCan nominate another medication that this depends on; if none is nominated, it's the medicine this dose is for
problem-abates Problem AbatesWhether a symptom, problem of finding abates. It's not really important what type it is. This is considered equivalent to 'patient responds to medication'. The degree of abatement is not definedbooleanDetail would be a problem, symptom or finding, if it's not just implied
problem-presents Problem PresentsWhether a symptom, problem of finding presents. It's not really important what type it is.booleanDetail would be a problem, symptom or finding, if it's not just implied
medication-tolerated Medication ToleratedMedication Is ToleratedbooleanCan nominate another medication that this depends on; if none is nominated, it's the medicine this dose is for
medication-funded Medication FundedMedication Is Funded / ApprovedbooleanCan nominate another medication that this depends on; if none is nominated, it's the medicine this dose is for
medication-available Medication Available(Sufficient) medication Is Available (e.g. Supply issues)booleanCan nominate another medication that this depends on; if none is nominated, it's the medicine this dose is for
